measured_by: average percentage of repayment in the Trust Game (TG)
justification: “The players were assigned to different reciprocal reputation groups by their real probability of reciprocating behaviors… The mean and the standard deviation of the percentage of repayment were calculated for each participant.”

measured_by: percentage of contribution in the modified Public Goods Game (PGG)
justification: “Trialwise percentage of contribution, which indicates the amount of money contributed to the public account relative to each trial's initial endowment, was used as the dependent variable.”

measured_by: response time (RT) during the Public Goods Game
justification: “The percentage of contribution and response time (RT)… were the dependent variables.”
